message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $90.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you being willing to negotiate.  However, $90 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now. Would you be willing to do $85?
I understand that $85 is a bit of a stretch for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can do $87.50. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway.  I'm still hoping to get closer to $85. Would you consider $86?

I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product, so I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $88. It's the best I can do, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
